articles.author: RNZ
articles.title: America's Cup: Sir Michael Fay, club veterans quit over Barcelona move - RNZ
articles.description: Veteran America's Cup campaigner Sir Michael Fay has resigned from the Royal NZ Yacht Squadron, in protest at the Cup's defence going offshore. He talks to Lisa Owen.
articles.content:
Veteran America's Cup campaigner Sir Michael Fay has resigned from the Royal NZ Yacht Squadron, in protest at the Cup's defence going offshore. And he is not the only one.   
In March, Team New Zeal… [+6153 chars]
